title: Timed Pulse Generator
description: This function block generates a pulse output based on an input signal with a specified time duration. It provides a true output for the duration defined by the time parameter PT when a rising edge is detected on the input signal IN. After the duration elapses, the output is set to false.
name: TP_X

input.name: IN
input.description: Boolean input for the triggering signal. A rising edge on this signal will start the pulse.

input.name: PT
input.description: Time duration for which the output Q will remain true after a rising edge is detected.

output.name: Q
output.description: Boolean output that indicates whether the pulse is currently active.

output.name: ET
output.description: Elapsed time since the pulse was activated.
